Description.Text: The Occidental Allegro Puerto Plata is a 4-star resort situated along the beautiful Playa Dorada beach. The all-inclusive resort offers three welcoming pools, a number of bars and comfortable accommodation. Situated just outside the tourist town of Puerto Plato, along the sandy coastline stretch of Playa Dorada, the resort is ideally located for anyone looking for a relaxing or fun-filled getaway in the Caribbean. The resort comprises of a number of Spanish-style villas, designed around the world-renowned Robert Trent Jones 18-hole Playa Dorada golf course. The resort contains a wide variety of facilities that will appeal to the leisure-going traveller. Guests can take part in volleyball, water sports, basketball, football, ping pong, darts and cards. There is a gym onsite and three pools. The hotel is also surrounded by an impressive 18-hole golf course, and guests can enjoy soothing massages in the hotel's spa area. The hotel has a diverse selection of restaurants and bars. There are three specialist a-la-carte restaurants, serving Italian, Mexican and Oriental cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a great variety of beers, sodas, cocktails and juices in the resort's bars, where they can dance until late into the night. The air-conditioned Superior guestrooms are bright and spacious, benefiting from a cheerful Caribbean sensibility. They come with a balcony or private terrace and offer a good range of amenities, including a ceiling fan, telephone, cable TV, a Shower and full bathroom, hairdryer, in-room safe and a mini-bar (chargeable). Parking is possible onsite.
